sentences.en: A Charpy test is usually much less expensive to perform than a fracture toughness characterization experiment.
sentences.cn: 夏比(冲击)试验通常要比断裂韧性试验的费用低得多.

sentences.en: Abstract: Polyphosphazenes are inorganic polymeric functional materialsthat have unique characterization.
sentences.cn: 文摘: 聚磷腈是一类具有特殊性能的无机高分子功能材料.

sentences.en: As a writer I am interested in characterization.
sentences.cn: 作为作家，我对人物塑造感兴趣。

sentences.en: Assemble prototype optical systems including subassemblies and integration with camera systems, characterization and trouble shoot.
sentences.cn: 组装样机光学系统，包括组件及与摄像系统集成，特性描述和故障检修。

sentences.en: Assist the product engineer in LimIt'setting for Characterization and volume manufacturing.
sentences.cn: 协助产品工程师在初始分析到量产过程中设定参数范围.

sentences.en: Characterization and evolution of tropospheric plumes from Lascar and Villarrica volcanoes, Chile.
sentences.cn: 来自智利Lascar和 Villarrica火山对对流层烟羽状的特征和发展.

sentences.en: Fruit maturity may play a part in phenotypic characterization.
sentences.cn: 果实成熟期使这种表现型特征可能明显地起一些作用.

sentences.en: I'm proud to say that I handled it nicely in the moment, but I'm embarrassed to admit how much this characterization annoyed me.
sentences.cn: 我很自豪当时自己很好地应对了这一情况，但是不好意思，我要承认这个人的描述方式惹恼了我。

sentences.en: Mystic River is a dark masterpiece about deep characterization, love, and betrayal.
sentences.cn: 神秘河流所展现出巧妙的特性描述 、 爱和背叛,绝对是一本不容错过的黑暗小说的杰作.

sentences.en: Objective: Preparation and Characterization of seasonal artificial bone biomaterial.
sentences.cn: 目的: 研究合理人工骨复合生物材料的制备及性能.

sentences.en: Permeability is an important parameter for a oil reservoir characterization and engineering.
sentences.cn: 渗透率是油藏描述和油藏工程中一关键性的参数.

sentences.en: Pilcher’s books have humour, good characterization, and lively dialogue.
sentences.cn: 皮尔彻的书风趣幽默，人物塑造到位，而且对话生动。

sentences.en: So that, its synthesis, characterization and application have a vital significance.
sentences.cn: 因此, 研究铂纳米微粒的合成 、 征及应用具有重要意义.

sentences.en: the characterization of physics as the study of simplicity
sentences.cn: 把物理学界定为一门探求简单规律的学问

sentences.en: The plot is good, but the characterization lets you down.
sentences.cn: 故事情节不错, 但是人物塑造却令人失望.

sentences.en: The real value of the book lies in its wonderful characterization.
sentences.cn: 这本书真正的价值在于精彩的人物塑造.

sentences.en: They also provide new research methods which can assist in the conservation and characterization of biodiversity.
sentences.cn: 它们还提供新的研究方法，有助于生物多样性的保护和特性描述。

sentences.en: This characterization of economic development implies lofty goals.
sentences.cn: 经济发展的特征含有一些崇高的目标.

sentences.en: This field is emerging as a discipline in its own right and is called crystal characterization.
sentences.cn: 这一领域正在形成一门独立的学科,称为晶体鉴定学.

sentences.en: This is the first characterization of these enzymes.
sentences.cn: 这是这些酶首次特征性描述。

words.tran_cn: 典型的；特有的；表示特性的
无个性的；缺乏特征的；平凡的
性格，品质；特性；角色；[计] 字符
在文艺作品中塑造人物；描绘性格
刻划……的性格；表示……的特性
描绘…的特性；具有…的特征

trans.tran_cn: 特性描述，（对书或戏剧中人物的）刻画，塑造，<正>描述方法，界定方法
trans.tran_en: the way in which the character of a real person or thing is described
